ROW.DATDSC: SELECT JB, MJBZ, KMBH, decode(jb,1,kmmc,decode(jb,2,' '||kmmc,decode(jb,3,' '||kmmc, decode(jb,4,' '||kmmc,decode(jb,5,' '||kmmc,kmmc) ) ) ) ) kmmc , decode(dwbz,1,'单位往来.','')||decode(grbz,1,'个人往来.','')||decode(gdzcbz,1,'固定资产核算.','')||decode(xjyhbz,1,'现金帐.',2,'银行帐.','') fzhs, ZJM, KMJC, KMLX, YXYEFX, QLBZ, DWBZ, GRBZ, GDZCBZ, XJYHBZ, ZZGS1, ZZGS2, ZZGS3, ZZGS4, SLH, AUTHOR, nvl(RJZKM_LRBZ,'1') RJZKM_LRBZ, DYKMBH, cw_pack4.kmmc(sbh,zth,DYKMBH) DYKMMC, KSSJ,JSSJ,(select name from v_cw_xzlx b where cw_kmb.xzlx=b.id) XZLX, (select name from v_cw_yhzl_dfdsb b where cw_kmb.yhzl=b.id) YHZL FROM CW_KMB WHERE org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and jb <= [%JB] + 1 and nvl(kmlx,'%') like '[%KMLX]%' and (kmbh like '[%KMBH]%' or '[%KMBH]' like kmbh||'%') and kmbh like '___[%XZLX]%' order by kmbh,jb

SELECT JB, MJBZ, KMBH, decode(jb,1,kmmc,decode(jb,2,' '||kmmc,decode(jb,3,' '||kmmc, decode(jb,4,' '||kmmc,decode(jb,5,' '||kmmc,kmmc) ) ) ) ) kmmc , decode(dwbz,1,'单位往来.','')||decode(grbz,1,'个人往来.','')||decode(gdzcbz,1,'固定资产核算.','')||decode(xjyhbz,1,'现金帐.',2,'银行帐.','') fzhs, ZJM, KMJC, KMLX, YXYEFX FROM CW_KMB WHERE org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' order by kmbh,jb
select count(*) CNT from v_accitem where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and acc='[%SYS_ACCID]' and slh='[%KMBH]' and mjbz=0
